com.noctarius.borabora.spi.codec

Enum TagStrategies

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<TagStrategies>
      • com.noctarius.borabora.spi.codec.TagStrategies
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagDecoder, TagEncoder, TagReader, TagStrategy, TagWriter, Serializable, Comparable<TagStrategies>

    public enum TagStrategies
extends Enum<TagStrategies>
implements TagStrategy
    The TagStrategies enum class implements all the builtin semantic tag strategies.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DateTime
      The Date and Time semantic tag implementation, semantic tag id: 0
      EncCBOR
      The Encoded CBOR semantic tag implementation, semantic tag id: 24

      The Timestamp semantic tag implementation, semantic tag id: 1
      UBigNum
      The Positive BigNum semantic tag implementation, semantic tag id: 2
      URI
      The URI semantic tag implementation, semantic tag id: 32

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean handles(Input input, long offset)
      Reads the data item at the current offset and returns true if this item can be handled by the current TagDecoder instance, otherwise false.

      Returns the assigned TypeSpec of this TagDecoder's data item if the given tagId matches the current one, otherwise null.

      • valueType

        public static ValueType valueType(Object value)
        Returns the actual ValueType based on the given value if there is a builtin implementation of a TagStrategy, otherwise null.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to find the ValueType for
        Returns:
        returns the according ValueType or null if no matching builtin TagStrategy is found

      • tagStrategy

        public static TagStrategy tagStrategy(ValueType valueType)
        Returns the TagStrategy based on the given valueType if there is a builtin implementation, otherwise null.
        Parameters:
        valueType - the ValueType to find the TagStrategy for
        Returns:
        the TagStrategy if found, otherwise null if no matching builtin TagStrategy is found
